title: My Hair
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Just as in real life, each child's hair is as unique as he or she is: curly, straight, dark, or light. Students will learn the concept of diversity, new adjective vocabulary, and reinforced high-frequency words.
meta: black, blond, braided, curly, hair, long, short, straight
Connect to prior knowledge to make meaning from text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main ideas and supporting details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /h/
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of a period at the end of a sentence
Antonyms : Identify words that are antonyms

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
